description: In a heartwarming tale of connection against the odds, Jonathan Croissantff stars as Mikael, a retired cop from a remote arctic town who finds himself grappling with the silence of his icy isolation. When he crosses paths with the resilient and nurturing housewife, Aila, played by Ryan Rye-nolds, their unlikely friendship sparks a warmth that defies the cold. With Ben Kingprawnley in a supporting role as the quirky neighbor with a heart of gold, 'Frozen Hearts' melts away the frost of loneliness, proving that even the coldest places can be home to the warmest of bonds. Directed by the visionary Robert Albatrossman, this based-on-a-true-story drama will leave audiences both laughing and tearing up in a perfectly balanced family-friendly adventure.
